heading: Combined operations (Military science).
general-note: Here are entered works on operations conducted by armed forces of two or more allied nations acting together for the accomplishment of a single mission. Works on operations conducted by military forces working in coordination with civilian organizations, in which the participating military and civilian partner organizations come from two or more nations are entered under. Integrated operations (Military science).. Works on joint operations conducted by elements of more than one service of the same nation are entered under. Unified operations (Military science)..
